machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;Basic settings: Layer height: {layer_height} Walls: {wall_thickness} Fill: {fill_density}
M190 S{print_bed_temperature}
M109 S{print_temperature}
G21 ;metric values
G90 ;absolute positioning
M82 ;set extruder to absolute mode
M107 ;start with the fan off
G28 X0 Y0 ;move X/Y to min endstops
G28 Z0 ;move Z to min endstops
G1 Z15.0 F9000 ;move the platform down 15mm
G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length
G1 F200 E3 ;extrude 3mm of feed stock
G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length again
G1 F9000;Put printing message on LCD screen
M117 Printing...

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
M104 S0 ;extruder heater off
M140 S0 ;heated bed heater off (if you have it)
G91 ;relative positioning
G1 E-1 F300  ;retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
G1 Z+0.5 E-5 X-20 Y-20 F9000 ;move Z up a bit and retract filament even more
G28 X0 Y0 ;move X/Y to min endstops, so the head is out of the way
M84 ;steppers off
G90 ;absolute positioning﻿

machine_max_acceleration_x.label: Maximum Acceleration X
machine_max_acceleration_x.description: Maximum acceleration for the motor of the X-direction

machine_max_acceleration_y.label: Maximum Acceleration Y
machine_max_acceleration_y.description: Maximum acceleration for the motor of the Y-direction.

machine_max_acceleration_z.label: Maximum Acceleration Z
machine_max_acceleration_z.description: Maximum acceleration for the motor of the Z-direction.

machine_max_acceleration_e.label: Maximum Filament Acceleration
machine_max_acceleration_e.description: Maximum acceleration for the motor of the filament.

machine_acceleration.label: Default Acceleration
machine_acceleration.description: The default acceleration of print head movement.

machine_max_jerk_xy.label: Default X-Y Jerk
machine_max_jerk_xy.description: Default jerk for movement in the horizontal plane.

machine_max_jerk_z.label: Default Z Jerk
machine_max_jerk_z.description: Default jerk for the motor of the Z-direction.

machine_max_jerk_e.label: Default Filament Jerk
machine_max_jerk_e.description: Default jerk for the motor of the filament.
